Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The memorial service for Joe Paterno at Penn State featured remembrances from players, and included a speech by Nike’s chairman, Phil Knight, that lambasted the board of trustees.
snippet: The memorial service for Joe Paterno at Penn State featured remembrances from players, and included a speech by Nike’s chairman, Phil Knight, that lambasted the board of trustees.
